javadoc: Panel that shows version history in a JTable.

methods.name: <init>

throws.comment:
if there was a problem accessing the
 version history

methods.javadoc: Set the domain file to show its history.
methods.name: setDomainFile
methods.comment: Set the domain file to show its history.

methods.javadoc:
Get current domain file
@return current domain file
methods.name: getDomainFile

methods.javadoc:
Get current domain file path or null
@return domain file path
methods.name: getDomainFilePath
methods.comment: Get current domain file path or null

methods.javadoc: Add the list selection listener to the history table.
methods.name: addListSelectionListener
methods.comment: Add the list selection listener to the history table.

methods.javadoc: Remove the list selection listener from history table.
methods.name: removeListSelectionListener
methods.comment: Remove the list selection listener from history table.

methods.javadoc:
Get the domain object for the selected version.
@return null if there is no selection
methods.name: getSelectedVersion
methods.comment: Get the domain object for the selected version.

return.comment: null if there is no selection

methods.javadoc: Return whether a version is selected.
methods.name: isVersionSelected
methods.comment: Return whether a version is selected.

methods.javadoc: Get the version number that was selected.
methods.name: getSelectedVersionNumber
methods.comment: Get the version number that was selected.

name: VersionHistoryPanel
comment: Panel that shows version history in a JTable.
